title: Data Infrastructure Engineer
description:
Equal IT is hiring an experienced professional to join our client's data-focused engineering team in Stockholm, with the mission to elevate the data platform and refine tooling for data ingestion, processing, and management.
 



  




* Relocation to Stockholm, Sweden may be possible for EU citizens



  





 The team is part of a broader division dedicated to crafting innovative solutions for data handling and insights.
 



  





 In this senior role, you are key in constructing a resilient, scalable data ecosystem that enables our organization to harness diverse data sources. The data framework relies on
 **Google Cloud** 
 and includes tools like
 **Airflow** 
 for orchestration,
 **BigQuery** 
 for data warehousing,
 **Terraform** 
 for iaC and
 **Kubernetes** 
 for infrastructure.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 



* Collaborate closely with a skilled, multi-disciplinary team to advance our platform, enhancing data collection, usability, and monitoring.
* Design guidelines and best practices for data pipeline architecture
* Oversee and optimize data integration workflows, including ELT and reverse ETL processes.
* Develop and implement solutions for data governance, cataloguing, and access.
* Enhance data reliability by integrating monitoring, CI/CD, and testing protocols.
* Liaise with stakeholders to interpret data needs and build fitting solutions.
* Stay at the forefront of data tech advancements to continually refine the infrastructure.



  





**Ideal Background** 



* 4+ years of experience building and managing data infrastructure and platforms as a Data, Site Reliability, Platform or Software Engineer.
* Practical experience with Data ingestion frameworks and orchestration tools.
* Hands-on knowledge of infrastructure-as-code
* Expertise in data pipelines, distributed systems, and cloud infrastructure.
* Solid Backend software engineering experience with Python
* A solutions-focused mindset that prioritizes impact.
* Ability to provide insights and opinions on data processes and infrastructure improvements.
* Familiarity with handling sensitive data and navigating compliance issues.
* Experience with event-driven systems and scalability challenges.
* A holistic understanding of the data flow from ingestion to analytics.



  





  





 For those looking to contribute to a cutting-edge data platform in a collaborative environment, this role offers the chance to make a substantial impact.

title: Senior Scrum Master
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.
   

  

**Jobbeskrivning**
* Facilitera agila ceremonier – PI-planeringar, daily standups, demos och retrospektiv – på ett sätt som bygger på delaktighet, resultat och ansvar
* Se till att teamets mål är förstådda och synliga
* Fånga, hantera och synliggöra hinder för att arbetet ska flyta på bra
* Hjälpa teamet att följa upp det dagliga arbetet
* Hjälpa produktägare att tydliggöra prioriteringar
* Planera för demos efter avslutade sprintar/inkrement
* Visualisera och rapportera teamets progress till olika intressenter


**Din profil (Skall krav)**
* Erfarenhet som Scrum Master enligt SAFe.
* Verifierade ledaregenskaper.
* Skapar engagemang och delaktighet, motiverar & samarbetar bra.
* Intresserad av att leda människor och utveckla team.
* Goda kunskaper i Atlassian Jira och Confluence


**Meriterande**
* Erfarenhet av konfiguration och anpassning av IdentityIQ.
* Erfarenhet av att hantera releaser och uppgraderingar av IdentityIQ.
* Erfarenhet om arbetssätt och verktyg för kodgranskning.


**Sista ansökningdatum:** 
 30-10-2024
   

  

**Om Deploja**
 Vi sysselsätter idag erfarna konsulter, inom bl.a. Systemutveckling, AI, Machine Learning, Test, Cloud, Infra DevOps, , IT-Projektledning.
   

  

 Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?
   

  

 Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Välkommen till Deploja, där gräset faktiskt är grönare!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.
   

  

 🌟 En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.
   

  

 🚗 Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.
   

  

 💼 Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.
   

  

 🌴 Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?
   

  

 🏥 Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.
   

  

 📚 Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.
   

  

 🕑 Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?
   

  

* Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.

title: Data Science Specialist
description:
We are seeking a Data Science Operations Specialist for a contract assignment to support our Data Science team in managing and prioritizing advanced analytics requests, including initial analysis and investigation. This role will coordinate efforts to develop chatbot solutions for various business areas and support the existing data science platforms. The position involves working closely with Operations & Support teams and supporting Databricks users, including handling basic and advanced platform needs. Key projects will include developing a reusable AI framework to support scalable AI applications. Documentation of processes, user guides, and technical manuals is also an essential part of the role.
   

  

 Tasks
   

  

* Handle, coordinate, and prioritize incoming advanced analytics requests.
* Conduct initial analysis and provide early insights for new data science initiatives.
* Lead chatbot development projects for various business streams.
* Collaborate with Operations & Support teams to assist Databricks users with platform needs.
* Support platform development, focusing on an end-to-end AI framework for scalable AI products.
* Document projects, create user guides, and develop manuals for data science tools.


**Requirements**
* Advanced degree in computer science, statistics, mathematics, or a related field.
* 5+ years of experience in statistical analysis, data science, or machine learning.
* Proficiency in Python or similar data-oriented programming languages and SQL.
* Experience with Azure or other cloud platforms, and advanced knowledge of Databricks, including Unity Catalog, workflows, CI/CD, and ML deployments.


**Preferred Qualifications:**
* Strong interpersonal and communication skills, with a collaborative approach to understanding and meeting business needs.


**Personal Characteristics:**
* Transparent, collaborative, and positive attitude, especially in challenging situations.


 This is a unique opportunity to work in a dynamic environment supporting impactful data science initiatives.
   

  

 Candidates must be based in the EU. It will be require to work onsite for the first few weeks in Orebro, Sweden. It will go remote after.

title: (Senior) Integration Solution Architect – based in Luxembourg
description:
**This position is based at our Luxembourg headquarters and requires regular office presence.** 
 The EIB offers you the opportunity to live and work in a truly international and multi-cultural environment. We also offer relocation support.
   

  

 The
 **EIB** 
 , the European Union's bank, is seeking to recruit for its Group Corporate Services Directorate – Group Digital Office (GCS-GDO), Platforms & Services Department (P&S), Integration Division (INT) at its headquarters in Luxembourg, a
 **(Senior) Integration Solution Architect** 
**\*.**
**This is a full-time position at grade 5/6 for which the EIB offers a permanent contract.**
*\*Internal benchmark (Senior) Officer IT Applications*
***Panel interviews are anticipated for November 2024***
 Purpose
   

  

 You will join our dynamic team to design and implement cutting-edge integration solutions. In this role, you will be the Architect of innovation, weaving together complex systems into seamless, efficient, and effective solutions, while evolving our Integration platforms to meet the highest architectural standards and best practices.
   

  

 Look no further – your next career opportunity awaits!
   

  

 Operating Network
   

  

 The primary role of the Integration Division is to provide well-designed and well-run integration platforms, working as a force multiplier for application teams and citizen developers, delivering standards, well-proven practices, services and solutions, enabling application teams and citizen developers to do the right things in the right way with substantial autonomy.
   

  

 As an Integration Solution Architect, you will be responsible for designing and implementing integration solutions that connect disparate systems, applications, and data sources. You will collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements, assess existing architectures, and develop comprehensive integration strategies. This role requires a blend of technical expertise, strategic thinking, and excellent communication skills.
   

  

 This is a pivotal role directly reporting to the Head of Division.
   

  

 You will work in close collaboration with various IT teams and internal stakeholders. You will have privilege connections with the Enterprise Architecture Team.
   

  

 Accountabilities
   

  

* Design end-to-end Integration solutions to meet specific user needs and ensure compliance with the Enterprise Architecture Standards, IT Security Policies, and industry best practices.
* Collaborate with stakeholders to gather and analyze integration requirements.
* Assess existing systems and identify opportunities for integration and improvement.
* Develop architectural designs, data models, and integration patterns.
* Define, together with Enterprise Architecture, standards, guidelines and best practices for integration development.
* Provide guidance and support to application teams throughout the integration lifecycle.
* Evolve the Integration Platforms in accordance with Enterprise Architecture guidelines and industry standards to ensure its long-term cost-effectiveness, Business value, usability, efficiency, maintainability, and scalability.
* Communicate the solution architecture vision to the team and provide supervision and guidance throughout the development process to ensure high-quality solutions.
* Conduct presentations and coaching for other IT Teams to facilitate adoption and efficient use of new Integration standards and technologies.
* Follow new market trends and propose innovative approaches to maximise IT’s contribution to the Business, initiating and contributing to IT-wide initiatives in the field of Integration.
* Manage projects to ensure solution delivery within the set schedule, budget and quality objectives, as also keep the stakeholders informed on the progress, timing and budget of the projects.
* Coordinate with other IT teams in the context of their IT projects, provide effort and cost estimates for IT Integration contribution to the projects and supervise the execution of tasks assigned to IT Integration.


**Qualifications**
* University degree (minimum an equivalent to a Bachelor) preferably in Engineering, Information Technology, Information Management or related field.
* Proven experience as an Integration Solution Architect or similar role.
* At least 5 years’ relevant professional experience of design and implementation of software Solutions.
* Proven experience and excellent technical knowledge of the tools and architecture of the Integration stack, including API Management, Event Streaming, Enterprise Service Bus. Data Virtualization, message-oriented middleware, SOA and microservice enabling technologies would be an asset.
* Broad and deep experience working in varied software development platforms and environments such as Java, Python, JavaScript, vendor packages, and Tomcat/JBoss.
* Hands-on experience with web services, RESTful APIs, XML, JSON, and other integration protocols
* Familiarity with cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud.
* Knowledge of security aspects of integrated system design and associated protocols, including token-based authorization and encryption.
* Excellent knowledge of English and/or French (\*\*), with a good command of the other. Knowledge of other EU languages would be an advantage.


 Competencies
   

  

*Find out more about EIB core competencies* 
 here
   

  

*(\*\*) Unless stated explicitly as a required qualification, a good command of French is not a pre-requisite for hire. As both English and French are however official working languages of the EIB, proficiency in both languages is a pre-requisite for your future career development. Any language clause in your contract must be fulfilled in order for you to be eligible for a promotion (either via the annual appraisal cycle or via an internal selection process). Proficiency is understood to mean the attainment of* 
*level 5 of the Inter Institutional language courses, corresponding to B1.2 of the Common European Framework of Reference for Languages (CEFRL). The Bank offers appropriate training support.*
 We are an equal opportunities employer, who believes that diversity is good for our people and our business. We encourage all suitably qualified and eligible candidates to apply regardless of their gender identity/expression, age, racial, ethnic and cultural background, religion and beliefs, sexual orientation/identity, disability or neurodiversity.
   

  

 To find out more about our eligibility criteria click here
   

  

 Applicants with specific needs are encouraged to request reasonable accommodations at any stage during the recruitment process. Please contact the EIB Recruitment team Jobs@eib.org who will ensure that your request is handled.
   

  

 By applying for this position, you acknowledge the importance of maintaining the security and integrity of the Information of the EIB Group. In case of selection for the position you agree to comply with all measures (policies, controls, document classification and management) implemented by the EIB Group to prevent unauthorised disclosure of any information or any damage to the EIB Group reputation.
   

  

**This is an open campaign to consecutively fill open positions. The campaign will remain open until position is filled. Applications will be reviewed in order of receipt.**

title: Azure tekniker
description:
Är det du vi söker?
   

  

 Som Azure Cloud Tekniker hos oss kommer du att spela en nyckelroll i vårt team, arbeta nära våra kunder och arkitekter i en mängd olika och stimulerande projekt. Din uppgift blir att medverka i leveransen av molnbaserade infrastrukturlösningar. Tillsammans med våra arkitekter kommer du att bygga, implementera och förbättra Azure-baserade lösningar, såsom att flytta applikationer och hantera andra delar av projekt och kunduppdrag. Du och ditt team ansvarar för att implementera nya funktioner och tekniska lösningar inom Azure för våra kunder.
   

  

 Vad vi förväntar oss av dig:
   

  

* Erfarenhet inom IT-infrastruktur, med fokus på Azure eller andra molnlösningar.
* Teknisk kompetens inom Microsofts infrastruktur- och plattformstjänster i Azure.
* Van att arbeta med IT-infrastruktur och molnlösningar.
* Förmåga att kommunicera väl på engelska i både tal och skrift.


 Personliga egenskaper vi tror på för att trivas i rollen:
   

  

* En proaktiv och positiv inställning.
* Starkt intresse för Azure, med en önskan att ständigt lära och utvecklas.
* Förmågan att arbeta självständigt och i team.
* Ansvarsfullhet och en positiv syn på samarbete.
* Entusiasm för att utforska och implementera nya lösningar.
* Motiveras av projekt som gör skillnad för både företaget och kunderna.


 Om B3 Cloud: Som experter på molnteknik och framtidens digitala arbetsplats, assisterar vi våra kunder i att övergå från traditionell infrastruktur till molnet. Vi erbjuder analyser, planering, migrering och förvaltning av IT-miljöer. Vi hjälper även kunder att uppnå modern samverkan och effektiv informationsdelning med Microsoft 365. B3 Cloud är en stolt Guldpartner och Cloud Service Provider (CSP) till Microsoft.
   

  

**Är du intresserad?** 
 Kände du igen dig i beskrivningen och är redo för en ny utmaning? Skicka in din ansökan nu och låt oss berätta varför B3 borde vara din nästa arbetsgivare! Observera att vi inte tar emot ansökningar via e-post, men vid frågor, kontakta Melinda på melinda.andersson@b3.se.
   

  

 Vill du veta mer om förmånerna hos oss? Här är några:
   

  

* Konkurrenskraftig lön.
* Frihet att styra din egen arbetsdag.
* Stora möjligheter till personlig utveckling.
* Interna utbildningar genom Cloud Skolan.
* Årliga konferensresor, sommar- och julfester.
* Regelbundna sociala aktiviteter, allt från After Works till frisbeegolf.


**Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!**
*Som en del av B3-koncernen, är B3 Cloud rankad som Sveriges tredje bästa arbetsplats 2021 av Great Place to Work, utsett till Sveriges IT Karriärföretag 2022 och 2023, samt vann utmärkelsen Årets Karriärföretag 2022. Vi lever efter våra värdeord: erfarenhet, mångfald och energi, och satsar på hållbarhet i alla led. Vi tror att medarbetare som mår bra presterar bättre och har därför B3 Team som anordnar aktiviteter inom wellness, från yoga och löpning till musikquiz och föreläsningar om stresshantering och mental hälsa.*

title: Backend Engineer (Node.js, Typescript)
description:
**Job Description**
 Are you passionate about building scalable and efficient backend systems for headless ecommerce platforms? We are seeking a highly skilled Backend Engineer specializing in Node.js, TypeScript and Azure to join our dynamic team. As a key member of our development team, you will play a crucial role in designing, developing, and maintaining robust backend solutions that power headless ecommerce applications. You will work in an agile team and collaborate with our product managers, lead engineers, and frontend engineers to deliver high-quality, scalable, and resilient software solutions. The ideal candidate is passionate about backend development, has a strong understanding of JavaScript/ TypeScript principles, and keeps up to date with the latest trends and best practices in backend development using Node.js.
   

  

 In addition to the above, your role will involve:
   

  

**API Design** 
 : Collaborating on the design and implementation of APIs that facilitate seamless communication between the frontend and backend, ensuring an efficient flow of data in the headless ecommerce environment.
   

  

**Databases (SQL/ NoSQL)** 
 : Contributing to data modelling and database design, optimizing storage and retrieval mechanisms to align with the requirements of a headless ecommerce architecture.
   

  

**Azure Cloud** 
 : Leveraging your expertise in Azure Cloud services to enhance the scalability, reliability, and performance of our backend systems, ensuring a seamless integration with our headless ecommerce applications.
   

  

**Qualifications**
* Proven experience as a Backend Engineer with a focus on Node.js and TypeScript
* Expertise in API design and development, with a strong understanding of RESTful and GraphQL principles.
* Experience in integrating data from diverse sources into backend systems.
* Proficiency in database management (both SQL and NoSQL), with knowledge of data modelling and design principles.
* Experience in Azure Cloud services and their application in backend development.
* Familiarity with headless ecommerce architecture and best practices.
* Familiarity with testing frameworks and tools, such as Jest, Mocha, Chai, or similar.
* Knowledge about Containerization Technologies (Kubernetes) is a plus.
* Good to have knowledge on Centra (headless eCommerce) and Storyblok (headless CMS)
* Should have knowledge on CI/ CD pipelines using GitHub actions.
* Troubleshoot and resolve issues, bugs, and performance bottlenecks.
* Conduct code reviews, identify areas of improvement, and provide constructive feedback to maintain code quality and consistency.
* Write clean, well-documented code and ensure proper version control using Git or other version control systems.
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills.


**Additional Information**
 This is a
 **fulltime permanent position** 
 , starting as soon as possible according to agreement. The role is an on-site position, based in our office in Stockholm, Sweden.
   

  

 Apply by sending in your
 **CV in English** 
 as soon as possible, but no later than the
 **31st of November** 
 . Due to data policies, we only accept applications through career page.
   

  

**Benefits**
 We offer all our employees at H&M Group attractive benefits with extensive development opportunities around the globe. All our employees receive a staff discount card, usable on all our H&M Group brands in stores and online. Brands covered by the discount are H&M (Beauty and Move included), COS, Weekday, Monki, H&M HOME, & Other Stories, ARKET, Afound. In addition to our staff discount, all our employees are included in our H&M Incentive Program – HIP. You can read more about our H&M Incentive Program here.
   

  

*In addition to our global benefits, all our local markets offer different competitive perks and benefits. Please note that they may differ between employment type and countries.*
**Inclusion & Diversity**
 H&M is a part of H&M Group. At H&M Group, we’re determined to create and maintain inclusive, diverse and equitable workplaces throughout our organisation. Our teams should consist of a variety of people that share and combine their knowledge, experience and ideas. Having a diverse workforce leads to a positive impact on how we address challenges, on what we perceive possible and on how we choose to relate to our colleagues and customers all over the world. Hence all diversity dimensions are taken into consideration in our recruitment process.
   

  

*We are committed to a recruitment process that is fair, equitable, and based on competency. We therefore kindly ask you to not attach a cover letter in your application.*
**Company Description**
 H&M is a fashion brand that offers the latest styles and inspiration, from fashion pieces and unique designer collaborations to affordable wardrobe essentials. Our business idea is fashion & quality at the best price in a sustainable way. Learn more about H&M here.

title: Systemadmin Atlassian
description:
Inera är ett digitaliseringsbolag som bidrar till att utveckla välfärden. Vi är Sveriges digitala ingång till hälsa, vård och omsorg och utvecklar digital infrastruktur för en sammanhållen välfärd. Vi arbetar på uppdrag av kommuner och regioner. Vår vision är världens mest innovativa och omtänksamma välfärd.
   

  

 För att kunna upprätthålla hög kvalitet inom hälsa, vård och omsorg måste välfärden utvecklas, med oförändrade eller minskade resurser. Genom digitalisering – att förändra strukturer, beteenden och arbetssätt med stöd av digital teknik – kan flera av välfärdens utmaningar mötas. Det gör Ineras uppdrag viktigare än någonsin.
   

  

**Om rollen** 
  

  

 Sektionen för internt it-stöd och verktyg ansvarar för Ineras interna digitala infrastruktur. Vi stöder cirka 450 medarbetare genom att tillhandahålla nätverk, arbetsplatser, mobiltelefoner samt stödverktyg och tillhörande licenser för datorer och programvaror. Sektionen består av cirka 14 medarbetare, uppdelade i två team; Intern it och Stödverktyg.
   

  

 Teamet som förvaltar och hanterar Ineras stödverktyg ansvarar för många olika verktyg, där de största är ServiceNow och Atlassian-produkterna. Dessa stödverktyg används inte endast inom hela Inera utan även av våra externa kunder, leverantörer och samverkanspartners. Teamet som förvaltar Atlassian-produkterna består av tre personer samt ett konsultteam. De stöttar verksamheten genom att konfigurera produkterna, tilldela behörigheter, ge användarstöd och mycket mer. Verktygen används dagligen av verksamheten för ärendehantering, dokumentation, kodhantering vid systemutveckling samt övergripande portföljstyrning för långsiktig verksamhetsplanering. Användningen av produkterna har ökat sedan Inera införde agilt arbetssätt. De Atlassian-produkter som förvaltas är Jira, Confluence och Bitbucket samtliga i cloud-versioner.
   

  

 I Atlassian-teamet kommer du att arbeta med att bygga upp och koppla ihop strukturer och flöden. Du kommer att sätta upp nya Jira-projekt, Confluence-platser och Bitbucket-repositories, hantera supportärenden från kollegor internt i organisationen, tilldela behörigheter, diskutera med leverantörer för att hitta de bästa lösningarna för Inera samt samla in och bearbeta krav från verksamheten.
   

  

**Är det här du?**
 Vi söker dig med relevant högskolutbildning, gärna med it-inriktning, eller motsvarande erfarenhet. Du har erfarenhet av att administrera eller arbeta med Atlassian-produkter (Jira, Confluence och Bitbucket). Det är också meriterande om du har erfarenhet av att ha arbetat i en support/service-organisation samt av att omvandla krav och behov till lösningar i en produkt.
   

  

**Varaktighet och tillträde**
 Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning på heltid. Intervjuer kommer ske löpande och tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas innan ansökningstidens slut.
   

  

**Har du frågor om tjänsten?**
 Sektionschef Kundstöd, Maria Walkenström, maria.walkenström@inera.se
   

  

 Fackliga frågor (Vision), Monica Rosén, 072-724 32 81

title: iOS Developer – Video Streaming Player expert
description:
iOS Developer – Video Streaming Player Expert
 



  





 We’re seeking an iOS Developer with strong experience in video streaming and player development to join our expert team at Eyevinn Technology. You’ll work on exciting projects that enhance the video experience for our clients.
 



  





 What You’ll Do:
 



 - Develop and optimize iOS video player applications.
 



 - Work on cross-platform solutions with React Native.
 



 - Collaborate on projects ranging from technical implementation to business advisory, focusing on video streaming solutions.
 



 - Contribute to open-source projects.
 



  





 Requirements:
 



 - 5+ years of software development experience, with 3+ years in video streaming player development.
 



 - Proficient in iOS development using Swift and AVPlayer.
 



 - Experience with React Native.
 



 - Familiarity with technologies such as HLS, MPEG-DASH, and DRM.
 



  





 Meriting Skills:
 



 - Knowledge of FFmpeg, cloud components, and open-source streaming tools.
 



 - Experience with CI/CD systems and video streaming across Smart TVs and connected devices.
 



  





 If you’re passionate about video streaming technology, we’d love to hear from you! Drop an email at work@eyevinn.se or apply on LinkedIn.
 



  





 About Eyevinn Technology
 



 Eyevinn is the leading independent expert in video technology and media distribution. We work with world-renowned media companies and innovative start-ups, contributing to open-source and advancing video streaming technology.

title: Data Engineer
description:
**B3 Business Transformation söker engagerade och drivna Data Engineers som vill vara en del av ett härligt och kompetent team och som vill utvecklas tillsammans med oss.**
 Vi på B3 Business Transformation stärker våra kunders digitala konkurrenskraft genom att vara datadrivna i sina processer, analyser och vid beslutsfattande. Med vår kompetens inom Advanced Analytics, Data Warehouse, Business Intelligence i kombination med stor affärsförståelse leder vi våra kunder in i ett datadrivet arbetssätt och möjliggör utveckling av nya digitala initiativ och etablering av moderna arbetssätt. Så varför inte ta chansen att bli en del av ett kompetent team som drivs av utveckling, samhörighet och energi.
   

  

**Om rollen:**
 Som konsult hos oss ges du möjligheter till intressanta uppdrag hos en mängd olika spännande kunder. Att du har förmågan att skapa relationer och på ett prestigelöst sätt samarbeta i team tror vi är avgörande för att du ska lyckas i ditt uppdrag. Som Data Engineer är ditt fokus att designa, modellera, utveckla datalager och integrationsflöden från en eller flera olika källsystem, för att lagra data i strukturerade eller semistrukturerade datakällor. Du arbetar självständigt eller tillsammans med kompetenta kollegor, där ni formar en effektiv informationslösning vilket är en förutsättning för att skapa ett bestående datadrivet arbetssätt hos kunden.
   

  

**Ett CV säger inte allt men vi** 
 ser att du har följande kvalifikationer:
   

  

* Du har minst 3 års erfarenhet från att ha arbetat som Data Engineer.
* Du har erfarenhet av flera olika moderna ramverk och utvecklarverktyg för t.ex ETL/ELT-flöden, Databaser, Data Warehouse, DataLake, Datamodellering och DevOps.
* Du har erfarenhet av att ha arbetat i en eller flera molnplattformar – Azure, AWS, GCP.
* Det är meriterade om du har arbetat som konsult
* Du arbetar obehindrat på svenska och engelska i både tal och skrift.


**Vi erbjuder:**
* Attraktiv lönemodell.
* Goda förutsättningar för flexibla arbetstider.
* Möjligheter att gå relevanta utbildningar och ta attraktiva certifikat.
* Multi cloud-satsning.
* Bra ramavtal och en stark säljorganisation som skapar förutsättningar för många spännande uppdrag.
* En fantastisk wellness- och medarbetarsatsning. Läs mer här


 B3 Business Transformation är en del av B3 Consulting Group, ett av Sveriges snabbast växande företag inom IT och management. Således kan vi erbjuda det bästa av två världar. Styrkan hos ett stort börsnoterat bolag i kombination med den härliga samhörigheten som ett mindre bolag erbjuder.
   

  

 Vi är även stolta över att vi vann priset som ”Årets Karriärföretag” 2022 och kom på tredje plats som Sveriges bästa bolag enligt ”Great Place to Work 2021”. Vi tror att det beror på vår energi, vårt sätt att välkomna olikheter och våra erfarenheter som vi gärna delar med oss av. En central del av energiskapandet är vår unika wellness-satsning Team B3. Vi tror att medarbetare som mår bra, presterar bra och vill vara engagerade kollegor och goda medmänniskor. Det är även viktigt för oss att ge dig möjligheter till att löpande utbilda och certifiera dig inom relevanta områden för att du ska känna att du utvecklas och ökar ditt marknadsvärde.
   

  

 De som jobbar kvar hos oss efter många år pratar om friheten att påverka sina uppdrag, arbetstider och utveckling. De talar även om stoltheten över att vara en del av ett bolag som inte bara levererar förstklassigt resultat till sina kunder utan även tar ansvar för samhället i stort bl.a. genom att vara partner till fina initiativ som Women in Tech, Changers Hub, Pink Programming m.fl.
   

  

**Kontakt:**
 Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig, så ansök redan idag.
   

  

 Vi tar inte emot ansökningar via mail, men har du någon fråga är du mer än välkommen att höra av dig till Talent Acquisition Partner marcus.krebs@b3.se

title: Head of Product Management, in Cash Management-Tietoevry Banking (m/f/d)
description:
**You may apply to Tietoevry by selecting Apply and fill your application details to the form. You may also Apply by using LinkedIn and populate details to your application from your LinkedIn profile.**
 We are looking for a Head of Product Management, in Cash Management who wants to be part of Tietoevry Banking. Tietoevry Banking is the leading financial services software and solution partner in the Nordics. We offer modular, pre-integrated banking as a service solutions and market-leading software for core, payments, credit, cards, financial fraud, and wealth. With our scale, expertise, and specialization, we empower financial institutions to enhance agility, efficiency, and accelerate digital transformation.
   

  

**When joining Tietoevry Banking as a** 
**Head of Product Management, in Cash Management**
 Head of Product in Cash Management is responsible for defining product vision and strategy as per the market trends, growth opportunities and business cases.
   

  

 Owns P&L and commercial success of the Product and develops business and ecosystem around the Product.
   

  

 Outlines strategic roadmap for delivering capabilities and functionalities that enable differentiation against competition.
   

  

 Creating alignment between product roadmap and required delivery and support capabilities (the inside-out perspective). Also responsible for the attractiveness and competitiveness in the market as seen from the customer’s point of view (the outside-in perspective).
   

  

 Participates in the selection of technology, processes and tools required for the Product.
   

  

**Specific Responsibilities:**
* Proposing strategies and plans for future development of the product.
* Maintain a strategic dialogue with our Bank customers, to understand use cases and trends.
* Support sales cases and provide costs, performance indicators and reporting.
* Defining and maintaining the Product Roadmaps and presenting them to the customers
* Addressing the Key Change Requests from customers and prioritising them in the Product Roadmap
* Managing the P&L, investment budget and cost related to the Product.
* Driving partner ecosystem development together with sales
* Team management and leading, coaching and mentoring to build a strong team.


**We are looking for someone that has:**
* Good knowledge on Cash Management domain and use of Virtual Accounts.
* Ability to translate market needs and business opportunities to a strategic roadmap and balance long/short-term needs.
* Demonstrated commercial success to grow product business in global markets and global customers.
* Good understanding of Global Bank’s customer business domain.
* Good knowledge on competition and market situation.
* Fluent interaction with different customer stakeholders in sales and delivery related matters.
* Actively driving product and Business awareness towards customers, market, partners, and identifies potential sales cases.
* Good and effective communication in English, both written and verbal


**We offer:**
 We offer you professional growth, meaningful projects, open culture and good work-life balance! We offer you an opportunity to create the future of a growing, fast-developing and important sector. We believe that our organizational culture is an important part of enabling you to be successful. We provide a flexible hybrid work model as part of our culture and way of working. Finally, we also believe in curiosity and learning as a lifestyle where you need to unlearn and relearn every day as new possibilities emerge.
   

  

**Did we get you inspired?** 
  

  

 We look forward to your application!
   

  

 Interviews will be held continuously, so we encourage you to apply today! For more information or questions, please contact Talent Acquisition team recruitmentinbanking@tietoevry.com
   

  

 Hope to hear from you soon!
   

  

**Location:** 
 Fornebu, London, Solna, Riga.
   

  

*On specific positions we might perform background checks.*
**About Tietoevry**
 Tietoevry creates purposeful technology that reinvents the world for good. We are a leading technology company with a strong Nordic heritage and global capabilities. Based on our core values of openness, trust and diversity, we work with our customers to develop digital futures where businesses, societies, and humanity thrive.
   

  

 Our 24,000 experts globally specialize in cloud, data, and software, serving thousands of enterprise and public-sector customers in more than 90 countries. Tietoevry’s annual turnover is approximately EUR 3 billion and the company’s shares are listed on the NASDAQ exchange in Helsinki and Stockholm, as well as on Oslo Børs. Familiar yourself with what we do
   

  

 Creating purposeful technology to reinvent the world for good
   

  

 At Tietoevry, we believe in the power of diversity, equity, and inclusion. We encourage applicants of all backgrounds, genders (m/f/d), and walks of life to join our team, as we believe that this fosters an inspiring workplace and fuels innovation. Our commitment to openness, trust, and diversity is at the heart of our mission to create digital futures that benefit businesses, societies, and humanity. Diversity, equity and inclusion (tietoevry.com)

title: Cybersecurity Engineer, Resilience
description:
**Create moments that matter. Decode the future.**
 At the Electrolux Group, a leading global appliance company, we strive every day to shape living for the better for our consumers, our people and our planet. We share ideas and collaborate so that together, we can develop solutions that deliver enjoyable and sustainable living.
   

  

 Come join us as you are. We believe diverse perspectives make us stronger and more innovative. In our global community of people from 100+ countries, we listen to each other, actively contribute, and grow together.
   

  

 Join us in our exciting quest to build the future home!
   

  

**All about the role:**
 As software is playing an increasingly significant role in enabling digital consumer experiences, we are gearing up to become more agile, faster in responding to market demands and quicker in identifying new market opportunities. This involves elevating our appliances to digital, software-defined products in a seamless integration of modular electronics, software, and connectivity platform.
   

  

**We’re looking for a Cybersecurity Engineer, Resilience, to join us on our journey.**
**What you'll do:**
 Work on tools and methods that help detect and mitigate cybersecurity vulnerabilities in Electrolux digital products and their development and support infrastructure. This may include offensive cybersecurity testing, vulnerability scanning, penetration testing, threat-modelling, cybersecurity risk assessment and others, to support Electrolux long-term cybersecurity and privacy strategy for Digital Products.
   

  

**In detail, you will:**
* Perform risk assessment tests and audits of connected systems for cybersecurity issues, identify security vulnerabilities in digital products, applications, systems and infrastructure and drive their mitigation.
* Drive adoption of cybersecurity tools and best practices in software development within the Digital Experience organization.
* Compose and update threat models and assess security posture and risks related to Electrolux Digital Products.
* Support external cybersecurity testing by trusted 3rd party vendors, interpret and evangelize results and drive findings remediation with internal stakeholders.
* Carry out cybersecurity reviews and propose cybersecurity improvements to Electrolux Digital Products, recommend vulnerability mitigation and remediation strategies, working together with the Digital Product teams and Senior Architects.
* Continuously improve and test processes and procedures for security incident handling.


**Who you are:**
* You have a good understanding of cybersecurity principles, IoT systems, Linux, mobile operating systems, cloud computing and modern networking and computing architecture.
* You possess advanced cybersecurity technical skills; experience and expertise in some of: embedded system security, cloud/mobile security, TCP/IP security, cryptography, data protection at rest and in transit, identity and access control (e.g. RBAC, least privilege, ZeroTrust), PKI, digital signature, API and database security protection, security hardening. (some of these in yellow – a mix great)
* Expertise is necessary in some of the advanced cybersecurity testing topics: offensive testing, penetration testing, security code review, threat modelling, security testing with burpsuite, mitmproxy or other cybersecurity testing tools and techniques, reverse engineering, security risk assessment, secure development lifecycle, incident response and disaster recovery.
* You have experience with Red/Blue/Purple Teams, Offensive Security Testing, Ethical Hacking and Agile development methods (DevSecOps, Kanban Scrum); you are familiar with CI/CD tools (Jenkins, CircleCI). (some of these – good)
* You have 3+ years of experience OR BA with cybersecurity aspects of digital product development and a Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or Electronic Engineering, or comparable experience. Master’s Degree and/or cybersecurity specialization, is a plus.


**You demonstrate:**
* Collaboration - contributes to a highly collaborative environment that enables a cross functional team to flourish.
* Communication - effectively exchanges information and ideas with confidence and respect, able to demonstrate progress, raise issues and articulate changes on a frequent basis.
* Empathy - can understand and acknowledge the emotions and perspectives of others during conversations.
* Problem-Solving - able to connect the dots between insights, strategy, and conceptual direction; is outcome - as opposed to task - orientated.
* Adaptability & Resilience - can effectively navigate change, challenges, and setbacks while maintaining a positive and flexible approach.
* Proactivity - eager to learn and grow, sees challenges as opportunities, seeks and - is responsive to - feedback.
* Responsibility - accountable, reliable, and proactive in building systems and handling dependencies, contributing to a trustworthy and effective team dynamic.


**Where you'll be:**
 This is a full-time position, with a preferred location in Warsaw, Poland. We may also consider exceptional candidates at our Global Headquarters in Stockholm (Sweden), Porcia/Forli (Italy) or Prague (Czech Republic).
   

  

 Regardless of the chosen location, you will be part of a dynamic international team where English is the natural language.
   

  

**Benefits highlights:**
* Flexible work hours/hybrid work environment
* Discounts on our award-winning Electrolux products and services
* Family friendly benefits
* Insurance policy plan
* Extensive learning opportunities and flexible career path


 As part of Electrolux, we will continuously invest in you and your development. There are no barriers to where your career could take you.
   

  

**Find out more on:**
 ElectroluxGroup: https://www.linkedin.com/company/electrolux/life/lifeatelectrolux

title: Senior FP&A Solution Consulting Nordics (CPM / BPM / EPM)
description:
**Company Description**
 We are in Business for People, empowering people in service organizations with innovative Enterprise and Business software solutions. We’ve innovated and taken a new approach to delivering a Business Platform with ERP, FP&A, HCM and Procurement that works for people. Self-driving, adaptive and intuitive software that is changing the way people work. Our solutions empower people and deliver a better people experience so people can spend time on meaningful high value work they live for.
   

  

 Read more on our website about how we transform work and how people feel about it, so our customers and their people can thrive.
   

  

**Job Description**
 Our job in Solution Consulting is to understand our customers’ business challenges and to accurately show how Unit4 solutions can solve these challenges. To attain the best possible solution, you will spend time researching and discovering the customer’s challenges and goals.
   

  

* You will understand the customer, and challenge them, and become their voice in the sales process.
* You will delight and inspire our customers to help build and deliver their desired end goals.
* You are a trusted advisor who will naturally lead our customers and colleagues; you adapt, plan and mobilise people.
* You will be an expert in Unit4 solutions, you will understand and sell the value of Unit4solutions and why Unit4 is different to other suppliers in the marketplace.
* You love technology and you are driven to find the best possible solutions for our customers.
* Your expertise is what sets you apart from other roles in sales, customers will trust your advice and Unit4 professional services will believe in the vision you create for customers during the bid stages.
* The role will join and support the Nordics region and, as part of a global team, support all regions of the business on all FP&A solution consulting requirements from RFPs through to custom demo builds, through to demo delivery and presentations.


**Qualifications**
* FP&A / CPM / BPM / EPM presales / solution consulting / consulting experience.
* A professional financial qualification and/or relevant experience in the office of finance is desirable.
* Fluent Business level local languages and good English
* Technical FP&A / CPM / BPM / EPM experience and capabilities to model based on business requirements.
* You have a proven ability to create and deliver engaging solutions supported by excellent presentation and written skills.
* Demonstrable analytical skills and problem solving ability.
* You are an excellent communicator, have a good sense of humour and enjoy working in a team environment.
* You have the ability to build rapport within the organization and with external stakeholders at all levels.
* Previous experience or understanding of the wider Unit4 offerings is desirable, but not essential.


**Additional Information**
 Join Unit4 and you’ll be part of one of the most exciting journeys in the cloud software space today. We’re a fast-paced and high-growth people-centric cloud player offering a host of benefits & development opportunities for individuals serious about their career
   

  

* Work, learn & be inspired by some of the best talent in the software space
* Whole host of great benefits & perks, including uncapped time off!
* Talent program for high performers. Each year we provide a platform for high potential talent to accelerate their careers!
* Committed to corporate social responsibility with our Act4Good initiative, our global movement to do good, and a way for everyone at Unit4 to come together and engage in actions that benefit society
* Diversity4U. Helping our people thrive starts with a safe and inclusive work environment. We launched our Diversity4U program that builds on our “be genuine” value


 Enterprise software: ERP, FP&A, S2C, HCM - Unit4
   

  

 Unit4 is an enterprise software suite, including finance management, accounting, ERP, FP&A, S2C, HCM and talent management modules.

title: Power BI Consultant
description:
*Vill du vara med och växa med oss på B3 Business Transformation? Vi söker nu duktiga konsulter inom Power BI!*
*B3 Business Transformation stärker våra kunders digitala konkurrenskraft genom att vara datadrivna i sina processer, analyser och vid beslutsfattande. Med vår kompetens inom Advanced Analytics, Data Warehouse, Business Intelligence i kombination med stor affärsförståelse leder vi våra kunder in i ett datadrivet arbetssätt och möjliggör utveckling av nya digitala initiativ. Vi bidrar även till förbättring av den digital förmågan och etablering av moderna arbetssätt.*
**Om rollen:**
 Som Power BI specialist hos oss deltar du ofta redan i en tidig fas för att skapa insikter om de affärsmässiga förutsättningarna, identifiera datakällor och datastrukturer. Du har en bra känsla för hur man utformar effektiva visualiseringar av data. Vidare har du förmågan att arbeta självständigt och noggrant med Power BI, både som utvecklare och administratör. Du har erfarenhet av att framgångsrikt driva lösningar i mål tillsammans med olika typer av kunder i olika branscher. Du arbetar med kompetenta kollegor där leveransen kan omfatta flera olika områden men ditt fokus är att designa, modellera, visualisera data från en eller flera olika strukturerade och/eller semistrukturerade datakällor. På så sätt skapar du en effektiv informationslösning som utgör grunden till ett bestående datadrivet arbetssätt hos kunden.
   

  

 Du arbetar ofta i teamleveranser mot kund men även som individuell specialist. Du behöver även vara en god kommunikatör och en lagspelare som kan hantera många kontaktytor.
   

  

**Vad vi kan erbjuda dig:**
 Vi har en stark och dynamisk företagskultur, och tror på balans i livet. Som konsult hos oss kan du själv vara med och påverka din ersättning, arbetstider, kompetensutveckling och vilka slags uppdrag du vill ha.
   

  

 En ökad komplexitet inom våra kunders IT-miljöer ställer höga krav på våra specialistkompetenser. Även våra produktpartners kräver att vi håller oss uppdaterade om deras teknologier. Därför är det viktigt för oss att ge dig möjlighet att löpande utbilda och certifiera dig inom relevanta områden för att behålla eller öka ditt marknadsvärde.
   

  

**Vi söker dig som har:**
* tre års erfarenhet av utveckling i Power BI samt relevant högskoleutbildning eller någon specialinriktad utbildning inom området.
* erfarenhet av Phyton, R, och Scala eller Power Shell.
* vana av att arbeta med agila metoder.
* intresse av affärslogiken i våra kunders verksamheter.
* ett proaktivt, serviceinriktat och positivt förhållningssätt till verksamhet, kollegor, chefer och andra som berörs.
* personlig drivkraft samt är van vid att proaktivt lösa problem och införskaffa relevant information eller kunskap när det behövs.
* affärsmässig svenska och engelska i både tal och skrift.


**Du har kunskap inom några av nedanstående tekniska plattformar, lösningsmönster och verktyg:**
* Power BI – DAX-kod, Data Flow, rapporter, dashboards
* SQL-utveckling/kodning
* Visual Studio
* Informationsmodellering, Dimensionsmodellering
* Power BI Premium, Power BI Embedded
* Azure Analysis Services
* DevOps
* Qlik, Tableau, Looker, Cognos, SAS, BO
* Azure, Power Automate, Logic Apps
* AWS, Amazon S3, Redshift, Quicksight
* Google Cloud, BigQuery,
* Snowflake,
* Python, R, Scala


 Det är inte viktigt att kravbilden matchar dig just nu men du skall ha en vilja att nå dit och löpande utveckla dig själv och tillsammans med övriga kollegor utveckla B3 Business Transformation till att bli en ännu bättre arbetsplats.
   

  

 Läs mer om hur det är att jobba på B3 och hur vi arbetar med vår wellness och våra sociala initiativ
   

  

 Klicka på ansökan eller tveka inte att kontakta Mats Erkers på telefonnummer:
 *070-539 47 05* 
 eller email: mats.erkers@b3.se

 On behalf of one of our key partners RED has A new opportunity for a SAP Solution Architects with strong Manufacturing project for a new implementation project. The initial contract will be for 12 months with long-term scope.

 Specific skills/experience required:
